name: dependency-packer-webpack-plugin
description: Webpack plugin that packs dependencies for entrypoints individually
author: Martin Jesper Low Madsen <martin@martinjlowm.dk>

scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn build && pandoc README.org -t markdown | sed -E 's/^\[<([^>]+)>\]\(([^\)]+)\)$/[![Build Status](\1)](\2)/g' > README.md
scripts.test: yarn build && mocha -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register test/**/*.spec.ts
